intro: Psychotria duidana, commonly known as the Duidana psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. The plant has been studied for its potential pharmacological properties due to the presence of various alkaloids.
